text: Harry Smith (born August 21, 1951) is a retired American television journalist. He has worked for NBC News, MSNBC, and CNBC as a senior correspondent. He hosted the CBS News morning programs, The Early Show and its predecessor, CBS This Morning, for seventeen years. He retired from NBC News in March 2024. Category:American journalists Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Harry Smith (American journalist)
